about.title: 1. Fa UrbanDrop Ho
content: UrbanDrop yɛ online gua a ɛka customers ne adwumayɛfoɔ a wɔtɔn groceries, aduane, ne amammerɛ nneɛma a wɔde brɛ anaa wopɛ sɛ wopɛ. Yɛma digital infrastructure, payment processing, ne customer interface, nanso yɛnyɛ producer, yɛn de, anaa yɛtɔn adeɛ no.
Sɛ wotɔ adeɛ fa UrbanDrop so a, wopɛ fi adwumayɛfoɔ nkyɛn pɛ, ɛnyɛ UrbanDrop nko.

hero.desc: Yɛnyɛ gua nko. Yɛyɛ digital bridge a ɛde wo kɔ flavors, amammerɛ, ne nkurɔfoɔ a ɛma w'community yɛ fɛ.

purpose.quote: Sɛnea ɛbɛma nnawɔtwe mu nneɛma ayɛ mmerɛ na ɛde anigyeɛ bɛba nkurɔfoɔ nkyɛn.

hero.desc: Fa ka ho sɛ woyɛ adwumayɛfoɔ a wɔtɔn fresho ne quality aduane wɔ yɛn app mu.

reach.title: Fa w'ahoɔden kɔ akyirikyiri
reach.subtitle: Ka ho nkurɔfoɔ mpempem fi mmerɛ ne baabi foforɔ.

sales.title: Ma w'ayɔnkofa so
sales.subtitle: Ka w'ayɔnkofa so wɔ yɛn large user base so.

management.title: Management a ɛyɛ mmerɛ
management.subtitle: Di w'adi na gua ho nsɛm mfeɛ mmerɛ wɔ yɛn tools a ɛyɛ intuitive mu.

community.title: Community Support
community.subtitle: Fa ka nkabom adwumayɛfoɔ nkorɔfoɔ a wɔyɛ successful ho na nya support.

list.title: Kyerɛw w'adeɛ
list.desc: Fa upload na kyerɛ w'adeɛ a ɛyɛ unique ma nkurɔfoɔ bebree.

receive.title: Gye Orders
receive.desc: Fa notifications ntɛm wɔ orders foforɔ ho na di dwuma wɔ ho mmerɛ.

earn.title: Fa Sika na Ma Nso
earn.desc: Fa payments securely na hwɛ sɛ w'ayɔnkofa so nyinaa kɔ soro wɔ adeɛ biara a wotɔn.

analyze.title: Hwɛ Performance
analyze.desc: Fa analytics kɔ ho na hu w'ayɔnkofa ne customer behavior.

cta.title: Hyɛ mu ma w'adwuma nyɛ kɛseɛ wɔ Urbandrop nnɛ!
cta.desc: Ɛyɛ simin 10 nko na w'ahyɛ mu na wotɔ adeɛ. Ka ho adwumayɛfoɔ mpempem a wɔyɛ successful.
cta.footer: Nsɛmmisa bi wɔ hɔ? Yɛn team wɔ ha sɛ wɔbɛboa wo wɔ kwan biara so.

advertise.title: Fa Adwumaden Di
advertise.desc: Hyɛ w'brand ho nsɛm yɛn ho

listingProducts.headline: Kyerɛw W'adeɛ
listingProducts.description: Kyerɛ w'adeɛ wɔ local customers a wɔpɛ nokware ethnic groceries anim.

appBanner.headline: Premium App Banners
appBanner.description: Nya high visibility wɔ app home screen banners so.

inAppPromotions.headline: In-App Promotions
inAppPromotions.description: Fa promotions ne special offers a ɛbɛma wotɔn adeɛ na akɔfa customers foforɔ aba.

whoWeAre.title: Hena Yɛyɛ
content: UrbanDrop Group Limited yɛ kompany a wɔregister wɔ England ne Wales, company number 16026087.
Yɛyɛ online gua a ɛde customers bɔ adwumayɛfoɔ ho a wɔtɔn groceries, aduane a wɔadwene wie, ne amammerɛ nneɛma a wɔde brɛ anaa wopɛ sɛ wopɛ.

infoCollect.title: Nsem a Yɛboaboa Ano
infoCollect.intro: Yɛboaboa personal information ano a ɛboa yɛn ma yɛde som, yɛma no yɛ papa, na yɛdi yɛn dwuma so. Eyi betumi akɔ so sɛ:

direct.title: Nsem a Wode Ma Yɛn Pɛpɛɛpɛ
items: Din, nkontabuo number, ne delivery address.
Email address ne account password.
Payment ne billing information (yɛyɛ secure fa yɛn payment partners so).
Feedback, messages, anaa reviews a wode ma yɛn.
Merchant registration details (ma business users), fa company din, trading address, ne bank account details ka ho.

automatic.title: Nsem a Yɛboaboa Ano Ntɛm
automatic.intro: Sɛ wode UrbanDrop di dwuma a, yɛbɛboaboa ano ntɛm sɛ:
items: Device ne browser information (IP address, operating system, device type).
Location data (sɛ woma location services kwan).
Usage data te sɛ pages a wotɔɔ mu, app interactions, ne order activity.
Log files ne diagnostic data a ɛboa performance ne security.

thirdParty.title: Nsem fi Nnipa Foforɔ
items: Payment providers (sɛ wopɛ sɛ wuhu transaction status).
Identity verification services.
Delivery partners (sɛ wopɛ sɛ wuhu order delivery status).
Analytics ne advertising partners a ɛboa yɛn ma yɛte usage trends.

howWeUse.title: Sɛnea Yɛde Wo Nsem Di Dwuma
howWeUse.intro: Yɛde personal data di dwuma sɛ:
items: Di wo orders so na de brɛ wo.
Ka wo ho asɛm kyerɛ wo fa wo account, orders, ne customer support requests ho.
Sɔ w’ahofadi na bɔ hwɛ sɛ ɛnyɛ fraud.
Di payments, refunds, ne credits so.
Ma merchants nsa ka order details a ɛho hia.
Personalize wo experience na ka products a ɛfata wo ho.
Boa platform functionality, performance, ne content.
Di legal ne regulatory obligations so.

legalBasis.intro: Yɛde data no bɛyɛ adwuma sɛ wɔwɔ legal basis ma eyi sɛ:
items: Sɛ yɛyɛ contract a yɛwɔ wo ho (sɛ tumi fulfil order).
Sɛ yɛdi legal obligations so.
Ma legitimate business interests (sɛ yɛbɛboa user experience).
Sɛ woma consent (sɛ marketing).

marketing.title: Marketing Communications
content: Yɛbɛtumi asoma marketing emails anaa notifications fa products foforɔ, offers, anaa promotions ho sɛ woma yɛn kwan.
Wobɛtumi a yɛreyi ho fi bere biara sɛ:
items: Click “unsubscribe” wɔ email biara mu, anaa
Adjust w’preferences wɔ UrbanDrop app mu anaa frɛ yɛn.
marketing.note: Sɛ woyi ho fi a, yɛbɛtumi de non-promotional messages so (sɛ order confirmations anaa account notices).

sharing.title: Sɛnea Yɛde Wo Nsem Kyɛ
items: Merchants: sɛ wɔbɛtumi ayɛ, fulfil, na de brɛ wo order.
Delivery Partners: sɛ wɔde wo order brɛ wo pɛpɛɛpɛ ne anigyeɛ mu.
Payment Processors: sɛ wɔde di payments so securely.
IT ne Cloud Providers: a ɛboa yɛn ma yɛyɛ yɛn systems adwuma.
Analytics ne Advertising Partners: sɛ wɔbɛboa yɛn ma services ne marketing yɛ papa.
Regulators anaa Law Enforcement: sɛ ɔhyɛ no ma ɛho hia anaa sɛ yɛbɛbɔ yɛn ho ban.
sharing.note: Yɛntɔn wo personal data kɔ nnipa foforɔ nkyɛn.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.intro: Yɛkyɛ wo personal information bere a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛde yɛ dwuma a wɔboaboa ano no, fa legal, accounting, anaa reporting requirements ka ho.
items: Customer order records: yɛkyɛ ma mfeɛ 6 wɔ UK tax ne consumer laws so.
Merchant data: yɛkyɛ kɔsi sɛ account no da so active na mfeɛ 6 akyi.
Support messages ne feedback: yɛkyɛ ma operational ne legal reference.
retention.note: Sɛ data no nhu hia bio a, yɛbɛpɔw anaa yɛbɛyɛ anonymize no.

security.title: Data Security
content: Yɛde technical ne organizational measures a ɛfata bɔ wo data ho ban fi unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, anaa loss.
items: Encrypted data transmission (SSL/TLS).
Secure payment gateways (PCI DSS compliant).
Access controls ne authentication systems.
Regular security monitoring ne audits.
security.note: Nanso, online service biara nni hɔ a ɛnyɛ risk-free. Wo na wo hwɛ wo account credentials so.

international.title: International Transfers
international.intro: Nnipa foforɔ anaa partners betumi adwuma wo data wɔ UK anaa European Economic Area (EEA) akyi. Sɛ eyi si a, yɛde safeguards a ɛfata yɛ:
items: Adequacy decisions a UK anaa EU apaw.
Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs).
Binding corporate rules anaa protection mechanisms a ɛte sɛ no.

rights.title: Wo Ahofadi
rights.intro: Wɔ UK GDPR, wowɔ rights yi fa wo personal data ho:
items: Access: bisa wo data copy.
Rectification: correct inaccurate anaa incomplete data.
Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten"): bisa sɛ wɔpɔw wo data sɛ ɛnhia bio.
Restriction: kɔ so tumi limit processing.
Portability: nya wo data wɔ usable format anaa transfer kɔ ɔfoforo nkyɛn.
Objection: gyae processing ma legitimate interest anaa direct marketing.
Withdrawal of Consent: sɛ processing yɛ based on consent.
rights.contact: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wode rights yi di dwuma, frɛ yɛn wɔ DPO@urbandrop.io. Yɛbɛtumi bisa verification ansa na yɛbɛyɛ wo request.

cookies.title: Cookies ne Tracking
content: UrbanDrop de cookies ne similar technologies ma user experience yɛ papa, kae preferences, na analyze traffic.
Wobɛtumi manage anaa disable cookies wɔ browser settings mu, nanso ɛbɛtumi affect Platform functionality.
Sɛ wopɛ nsɛm pii, hwɛ yɛn Cookie Policy.

children.title: Mma Ahofadi
children.content: UrbanDrop nni hɔ ma mma a wɔyɛ mfe 18 ase, na yɛnni nim sɛ yɛboaboa personal data fi minors ho. Sɛ yɛhu a yɛaboaboa saa data a, yɛbɛpɔw no ntɛm.

links.title: Links kɔ Sites Foforɔ
links.content: Yɛn Platform betumi akyerɛ links kɔ third-party websites. Yɛn nni ho nhwɛso fa content, privacy practices, anaa security wɔ external sites no ho.

updates.title: Updates wɔ Policy Yi Mu
updates.content: Yɛbɛtumi update Privacy Policy yi bere biara. Latest version no bɛda ho wɔ yɛn website anaa app so. Sɛ nsakraeɛ yɛ kɛseɛ a, yɛbɛka kyerɛ users wɔ email anaa app notification ansa na ɛyɛ adwuma.

contact.title: Frɛ Yɛn
contact.intro: Sɛ wowɔ nsɛmmisa, adwene, anaa data protection requests, frɛ:
contact.ico: Wɔwɔ ho kwan sɛ wobɛkɔ Information Commissioner's Office (ICO) wɔ UK.
contact.website: Website: www.ico.org.uk

whatAreCookies.title: Dɛn ne Cookies?
whatAreCookies.desc: Cookies yɛ nkutoa ketewa a wɔde gu wo device so sɛ wopɛ sɛ wotumi kɔ website anaa di app dwuma. Wɔboa yɛn kae wo preferences, boa performance, na personalize wo experience. Cookies bi ho hia ma Platform yɛ adwuma yiye, na afoforo boa yɛn ma yɛte sɛnea users di yɛn services dwuma na yɛbɛtumi ayɛ adwuma no papa.

essential.title: Cookies a ɛho Hia
essential.desc: Saa cookies yi ho hia ma Platform yɛ adwuma. Wɔma core features yɛ adwuma te sɛ secure login, checkout, ne account management. Sɛ wɔnni hɔ a, services bi rentumi nyɛ adwuma. Examples ne sɛ wo login session, cart management, ne secure payment processing.

performance.title: Performance ne Analytics Cookies
performance.desc: Saa cookies yi boa yɛn ma yɛte sɛnea visitors de UrbanDrop yɛ adwuma, sɛnea pages a wɔpɛ paa anaa baabi a users nya errors. Yɛde data yi bɛboa navigation, speed, ne user experience. Examples ne Google Analytics ne app performance trackers. Data a yɛboaboa ano nyinaa yɛ aggregated ne anonymous.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.desc: Saa cookies yi kae wo preferences te sɛ language, location, anaa delivery address ma wo experience yɛ mmerɛ.

advertising.title: Advertising ne Marketing Cookies
advertising.desc: Saa cookies yi ma yɛn ne yɛn partners tumi kyerɛ wo offers ne promotions a ɛfata wo, wɔ UrbanDrop ne websites anaa apps foforɔ so. Wɔboa yɛn ma yɛntumi nkyerɛ saa ad no mpɛn pii. Examples ne Meta Pixel (Facebook/Instagram Ads) ne Google Ads Remarketing. Wobɛtumi ayi personalized ads fi w’account settings anaa browser privacy settings mu.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.desc: Cookies bi wɔ UrbanDrop fi trusted third parties a ɛboa yɛn ma yɛde certain services yɛ adwuma, sɛ analytics providers (e.g., Google Analytics), advertising networks, ne payment ne delivery partners. Saa third parties yi betumi de cookies di dwuma sɛnea wɔn privacy policies ka ho. UrbanDrop nni control wɔ wɔn cookie settings so.

managing.title: Sɛnea Wubetumi di Cookies So
managing.desc: Wobɛtumi manage anaa disable cookies wɔ browser anaa device settings mu. Browsers bebree ma wubetumi hu cookies a wɔde gu wo device so, pɔw existing cookies, na block cookies bi anaa nyinaa. Sɛ woyi cookies a, Platform bi rentumi nyɛ adwuma yiye (e.g., checkout anaa saved addresses). Wobɛtumi adjust cookie preferences nso wɔ UrbanDrop Cookie Settings banner bere a wopɛ website anaa account settings mu.

consent.title: Kɔyɛ Adwene Ma Cookies
consent.desc: Sɛ wopɛ UrbanDrop a edi kan a, wubɛhu banner a ɛbisa wo consent sɛ yɛde non-essential cookies di dwuma. Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wopaw “Accept All”, wopaw sɛ yɛde cookies nyinaa di dwuma sɛnea ɛkyerɛw ha. Wobɛtumi update preferences bere biara sɛ wopaw “Manage Cookies” wɔ site footer anaa w’profile mu. Essential cookies nhu consent efisɛ ɛho hia ma service a wopɛ no.

updates.title: Updates wɔ Policy Yi Mu
updates.desc: Yɛbɛtumi update Cookie Policy yi bere biara. Latest version no bɛda ho wɔ website anaa app so. Sɛ nsakraeɛ yɛ kɛseɛ a, yɛbɛka kyerɛ users wɔ email anaa app notification ansa na ɛyɛ adwuma.

contact.title: Frɛ Yɛn
contact.desc: Sɛ wowɔ nsɛmmisa fa yɛde cookies di dwuma ho a, frɛ:

notFoundPage.title: Krataa no Nnhu
notFoundPage.desc: Krataa a worehwehwɛ no nni hɔ anaa wɔakɔ faako foforɔ.

browseMenu.title: Hwɛ Menu
browseMenu.desc: Hwɛ yɛn aduane a ɛyɛ dɛ

becomeMerchant.title: Bɛyɛ Merchant
becomeMerchant.desc: Ka yɛn network of sellers ho

notFoundPage.illustration: Yɛnnhuu krataa no, nanso yɛhuu nneɛma foforɔ a ɛyɛ fres!
notFoundPage.searchSuggestion: Sɔ hwɛ nea wopɛ anaa kɔ yɛn Help Center.

banner.title: Yɛhwɛ wo ahofadi so
banner.description: Yɛde cookies di dwuma ma wo experience yɛ papa. UrbanDrop de essential cookies ma site yɛ adwuma, na optional cookies boa yɛn ma yɛte sɛnea wode di dwuma, personalize content, ne kyerɛ wo offers a ɛfata wo. Wobɛtumi paw Accept All Cookies, reject non-essential, anaa manage preferences bere biara.

modal.title: Cookie Preferences
modal.description: Di dwuma sɛnea yɛde cookies di dwuma wɔ site yi.

essential.title: Cookies a ɛho Hia
essential.description: Saa cookies yi ho hia ma UrbanDrop yɛ adwuma yiye. Wɔma secure login, checkout, ne payment processing yɛ adwuma. Wobɛntumi mfa wɔn nkɔ w’settings mu, nanso wobɛtumi block wɔ browser mu (ɛbɛtumi affect functionality).
essential.examples: Examples: login sessions, shopping basket tracking, payment processing.

performance.title: Performance ne Analytics Cookies
performance.description: Saa cookies yi boa yɛn ma yɛte sɛnea visitors de UrbanDrop yɛ adwuma, pages a wɔpɛ paa, anaa baabi a delays ba. Wɔboa yɛn ma speed, reliability, ne usability yɛ papa.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Saa cookies kae wo preferences te sɛ language, location, saved addresses, enti w’anhia sɛ wode bio.
functional.examples: Examples: preferred delivery address, saved shop filters.

advertising.title: Advertising ne Marketing Cookies
advertising.description: Yɛde yi kyerɛ wo personalized promotions ne relevant ads, wɔ UrbanDrop ne websites foforɔ. Wɔboa yɛn ma yɛtumi measure marketing performance na yɛnnhyɛ saa ads pii da.
advertising.examples: Examples: Meta Pixel, Google Ads Remarketing.

footer.text1: Wobɛtumi update cookie choices bere biara sɛ wopaw "Manage Cookies" wɔ website footer anaa app menu.
footer.text2: Sɛ wopɛ nsɛm pii, hwɛ yɛn

termsConditions.title: Mmara ne Nsɛm a Ɛda Hɔ

intro.title: UrbanDrop Website Mmara ne Nsɛm a Ɛda Hɔ
intro.p1: Akwaaba wo UrbanDrop. Saa Mmara ne Nsɛm a Ɛda Hɔ ("Mmara") no hyɛ wo ho nsow wɔ UrbanDrop website, mobile app, ne services a ɛka ho nyinaa ("Platform") a UrbanDrop Group Limited ("UrbanDrop," "yɛn," "yɛn de," anaa "yɛn deɛ") di dwuma.
intro.p2: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wode Platform di dwuma a, wopaw sɛ wobedi Mmara yi so. Kenkan yiye ansa na wode service no di dwuma. Sɛ wunnye nni a, ɛnsɛ sɛ wode Platform di dwuma.

about.title: 1. Fa UrbanDrop Ho
content: UrbanDrop yɛ online marketplace a ɛbɔ customers ne independent merchants a wɔde groceries, aduane, ne ethnic products bɛma delivery anaa collection ho. Yɛde digital infrastructure, payment processing, ne customer interface yɛ adwuma, nanso yɛn ara yɛnnyɛ products no, yɛnnyɛ owner, na yɛnnsan ntɔn wɔn a wɔwɔ Platform so.
Sɛ wopaw order wɔ UrbanDrop so a, wopɛ sɛ wotɔn fi merchant no nko ara, na ɛnyɛ UrbanDrop.

eligibility.title: 2. Sɛ Wobɛtumi de Platform di dwuma
eligibility.content: Wosɛ sɛ wowɔ mfe 18 anaa sen no ansa na wode Platform di dwuma. Sɛ wode di dwuma a, wopaw sɛ:
items: Wunya ho tumi sɛ wobɛtumi hyɛ contracts a ɛyɛ binding mu.
Wode Platform di dwuma ma nsɛm a ɛyɛ legal nko ara.
Wode nsɛm a ɛyɛ nokware bɛma wɔ account creation anaa order placement bere mu.

creation.title: 3.1 Account Creation
creation.content: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wopaw order a, ɛsɛ sɛ wokyerɛw UrbanDrop account. Wɔbɛhwehwɛ sɛ wode nsɛm a ɛyɛ nokware bɛma te sɛ din, delivery address, ne payment information.

security.title: 3.2 Account Security
security.content: Woyɛ responsible ma sɛnea wode login credentials bɛyɛ secure. Biribiara a ɛba wo account so yɛ wo responsibility.

misuse.title: 3.3 Misuse
misuse.content: UrbanDrop betumi suspend anaa close accounts a wɔde yɛ fraud, abuse promotions, anaa woyi Mmara yi so.

placing.title: 4.1 Placing an Order
placing.content: Sɛ wopaw order a, wopaw sɛ wotɔn products fi merchant a wɔda UrbanDrop so. Sɛ merchant accept order no a, contract bɛda ho ntam wo ne merchant no ntam.

confirmation.title: 4.2 Order Confirmation
confirmation.content: Wobɛnya confirmation fi Platform no so sɛ w’order no accept. Merchants betumi cancel order sɛ items nni hɔ anaa rentumi nyɛ adwuma, ɛnna ɛno akyi, w’ankɔ yɛ charge biara.

payments.title: 4.3 Payments
payments.content: Payments nyinaa yɛ securely processed via UrbanDrop payment partners. Woma UrbanDrop tumi collect payments ma merchant no.

pricing.title: 4.4 Pricing
pricing.content: Prices yɛ set by merchants na taxes ka ho. Delivery, service, ne packaging fees betumi ka ho na ɛbɛda ho ansa na checkout.

areas.title: 5.1 Delivery Areas
areas.content: Delivery wɔ nko ara areas a UrbanDrop anaa logistics partners yɛ adwuma.

partners.title: 5.2 Delivery Partners
partners.content: Orders betumi adi delivery via UrbanDrop delivery network anaa direct fi merchant. Delivery bere yɛ estimates na ɛbɛtumi sesa ɛfiri traffic, weather, anaa nsɛm foforɔ a ɛwɔ yɛn tumi mu.

collection.title: 5.3 Collection Orders
collection.content: Sɛ wopaw collection a, bra bere a wɔahyɛ ho. Merchants betumi refuse sɛ wɔnkɔda items ho sen bere a ɛyɛ reasonable.

platform.title: 6.1 Platform Promotions
platform.content: UrbanDrop betumi de promotions anaa discounts aba. Biribiara wɔ ne rules a ɛbɛka Mmara yi ho.

merchant.title: 6.2 Merchant Promotions
merchant.content: Promotions a merchants yɛ no yɛ wɔn own funding nko ara. UrbanDrop bɛhwɛ ne approve, nanso yɛnni responsibility wɔ sika ho.

misuse.title: 6.3 Misuse
misuse.content: UrbanDrop reserve tumi sɛ wɔbɛsuspend anaa remove offers sɛ abuse anaa fraud ba mu.

merchant.title: 7. Merchant Responsibilities
merchant.content: Merchants a wɔwɔ UrbanDrop yɛ independent businesses. Wɔyɛ responsible ma:
items: Accuracy of product information, pricing, ne images.
Food safety, hygiene, ne proper product labelling.
Compliance with local licensing ne trading laws.
merchant.note: UrbanDrop nnyi manufacturing, testing, anaa guarantee products a merchants toɔ no ho.

conduct.title: 8. Customer Conduct
items: Misuse Platform anaa bɔ ho nkɔfa.
Harass, abuse, anaa threat merchants, drivers, anaa customer support.
Create multiple accounts de exploit promotions.
Post false reviews anaa misleading feedback.
conduct.note: UrbanDrop reserve tumi suspend anaa ban account a ɛwɔ violation.

before.title: 9.1 Ansan Merchant Accept
before.content: Wobɛtumi cancel order free ansa na merchant accept.

after.title: 9.2 Akɔsi Merchant Accept
after.content: Sɛ merchant accept order no a, cancellation rentumi nyɛ, especially perishable anaa prepared items. Sɛ merchant de aduane resiesie a, wopɛ sɛ wopaw full charge.

merchant.title: 9.3 Cancellations fi Merchant
merchant.content: Merchants betumi cancel order sɛ products nni hɔ, order rentumi nyɛ adwuma, anaa delivery rentumi nyɛ. Wobɛnya full refund.

progress.title: 9.4 Delivery wɔ Progress Mu
progress.content: Sɛ w’order wɔ delivery mu a, ɛrentumi nkyɛ cancel.

repeated.title: 9.5 Repeated Cancellations
repeated.content: Customers a wɔrepeat cancel orders betumi nya account restricted anaa suspended.

general.title: 10.1 General Policy
general.content: Efisɛ UrbanDrop bɔ customers ne independent merchants ho nkɔ, refunds ne returns bɛyɛ based on item nature ne request circumstances.

perishable.title: 10.2 Perishable ne Prepared Items
perishable.content: Sɛ ɛyɛ fresh produce, chilled/frozen foods, ne cooked meals a, refunds/returns nni hɔ sɛ order wɔ delivered anaa collected, gye sɛ:
items: Item no bɔne, expired, anaa unsafe for consumption bere a delivery.
Wrong item deliver.
Order nni complete.
perishable.note: Report issues kyerɛ UrbanDrop Support wɔ 24 hours delivery akyi. Photos betumi hia.

nonPerishable.title: 10.3 Non-Perishable Items
nonPerishable.content: Sɛ ɛyɛ packaged, sealed, anaa non-perishable items, merchants betumi accept returns sɛ UK consumer law ka ho:
items: Item no faulty anaa nkyerɛ nea ɛda ho.
Wɔde san brɛ sɛ unused ne original packaging.

process.title: 10.4 Refund Process
process.content: Refund bɛyɛ processing sɛ merchant confirm eligibility. UrbanDrop bɛcredit w’payment method mu within 5–10 business days.

merchantResp.title: 10.5 Merchant Responsibility
merchantResp.content: Merchants yɛ responsible handling refund requests fi wɔn products ho. UrbanDrop facilitate communication ne payment adjustment nanso yɛnni final decision.

delivery.title: 10.6 Delivery Issues
delivery.content: Sɛ order delayed, lost, anaa delivered wrong address, frɛ UrbanDrop Support. Refunds/redelivery betumi hwehwɛ based on tracking ne merchant confirmation.

abuse.title: 10.7 Refund Abuse
abuse.content: Repeat refund claims a ɛnni valid cause betumi result wɔ account flagged anaa suspended.

ip.title: 11. Intellectual Property
ip.content: Trademarks, content, ne technology a ɛwɔ Platform so yɛ UrbanDrop Group Limited anaa licensors. Wobɛntumi nkyerɛw, distribute, anaa modify Platform biara sɛ wunnya written permission.

availability.title: 12. Platform Availability
availability.content: Yɛbɔ mmɔden sɛ UrbanDrop bɛda hɔ 24/7, nanso betumi suspend/update services ma maintenance. Yɛnni liability wɔ temporary interruptions anaa data loss.

privacy.title: 13. Privacy ne Data Protection
privacy.content: W’personal data yɛ collected ne processed sɛnea Privacy Policy ka ho, a ɛwɔ Platform. Sɛ wode UrbanDrop di dwuma a, woma consent sɛ yɛde data di dwuma ma order processing, fraud prevention, ne customer service.

role.title: 14.1 Role of UrbanDrop
role.content: UrbanDrop yɛ intermediary ntam customers ne merchants. Yɛnni responsibility ma:
items: Product quality, safety, authenticity.
Incorrect anaa incomplete orders fi merchants.
Delivery issues a third parties yɛ.

indirect.title: 14.2 Indirect Losses
indirect.content: Yɛnni liability ma indirect, incidental, anaa consequential damages fi Platform usage.

maximum.title: 14.3 Maximum Liability
maximum.content: Yɛn total liability ma user biara rentumi nkyɛ amount a wɔtɔ order no anaa £50, nea ɛkɔ fam.

termination.title: 15. Account Termination
termination.content: UrbanDrop betumi suspend anaa close w’account sɛ wopaw:
items: Woyi Mmara yi so.
Fraud anaa abusive activities.
Misuse promotions anaa violate laws.
termination.note: Wobɛtumi request account deletion bere biara frɛ UrbanDrop Support.

links.title: 16. Third-Party Links
links.content: Platform betumi yɛ links kɔ third-party websites. UrbanDrop nni responsibility ma content anaa policies a ɛwɔ hɔ, na sɛ wokɔ a, woyɛ own risk so.

changes.title: 17. Nsakraeɛ wɔ Mmara Yi Mu
changes.content: UrbanDrop betumi update Mmara yi bere biara. Changes bɛyɛ effective bere a wɔde hyɛ Platform so. Sɛ wode UrbanDrop di dwuma a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ wopaw latest version no.

governing.title: 18. Governing Law
governing.content: Mmara yi yɛ governed by laws of England ne Wales. Disputes a ɛfiri anaa fa Mmara yi ho bɛyɛ subject to exclusive jurisdiction of courts of England ne Wales.

contact.title: 19. Frɛ Yɛn
contact.content: Sɛ wowɔ nsɛmmisa, complaints, anaa refund requests a, frɛ:
